spatial_accuracy.notes: Major deviation in room layout. The entire right-side quadrant containing the stairs and secondary bathroom/entry area is completely missing or merged inconsistently. The entrance door has been moved to the kitchen wall.

structural_fidelity.notes: The internal staircase is entirely omitted (E1). The laundry/utility area adjacent to the bathroom is missing. Hallucinated a TV unit and changed window positions on the left facade.

furniture_mapping.notes: Basic furniture items (bed, sofa, dining table) are present but their orientation often ignores the floor plan's intent. The sink on the island is misplaced compared to the 2D plan.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High quality rendering with clean geometry, consistent lighting, and correct isometric perspective. The visual style is professional even though the data accuracy is low.

detected_errors.description: Entire staircase and entry hallway on the right side of the plan are missing.
The main entrance door is missing from its original location and a side door has been hallucinated in the kitchen area.
Hallucinated a TV and TV stand in the living area not present in the original 2D floor plan.
Window on the left wall is transformed into a large opening/cutout rather than matching the plan's window/mullion pattern.
Proportions of the bathroom are significantly altered to accommodate the omission of the stairs.
